item.description:
This is NOT a Flat Ride.  It is good, for those in Training, for upcoming rides.

 

There is plenty to see.  Water Views, Various Farms, & yes Llamas.

 

A nice feature, you are never more than a couple of miles, from your car.  Should you get tired.

 

It is entirely on Back Roads.  No Main Roads to worry about.

 

I want to Ride 15-20 Miles.  You can go less, if you need too.

 

There is One  Real Hill, you can see if you are in condition.

 

Everyone is Welcome, as we are Riding, in an enclosed area.  Feel free to challenge yourself.

 

There are Quite a few places to have Lunch.  Some have outdoor seating.  I guess, we will have to see how the Weather is.
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the Gravel Parking Lot. House # 33, was the closest house, to the Parking Lot.
item.name: Bike Rocky Point
